name: Roger D. Chamberlain
content: Home Page for Roger Chamberlain Roger D. Chamberlain Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering McKelvey School of Engineering Washington University in St. Louis St. Louis, Missouri, USA Intro video E-mail: roger AT wustl.edu Snail mail: Campus Box 1045 One Brookings Dr. St. Louis, MO 63130-4899 Office: McKelvey 1053 314-935-5708 (office) 314-935-7302 (fax) Brief Bio A bit about me. What do I do? Teach talented students Perform research in the areas of stream based supercomputing and instruments for astrophysics Publish research results Consult with industry Have a life away from work Past research projects include: high performance computational biology optical interconnects shared-resource parallel and distibuted processing low-power systems liquid architecture Last modified 26 Aug 2024 Roger Chamberlain <roger AT wustl.edu>
